page.description: Adds a number of months to a date.
page.syntax: Ending_Date as D = ADDMONTHS(D date,N months)

argument.name: date
argument.description: The date to which you will add business days.

argument.name: months
argument.description: The number of months to add. Numeric

page.discussion: ADDMONTHS() returns an Ending_Date equal to the specified Starting_Date plus the specified Number_Of_Months. The ADDMONTHS() function adds the specified Number_Of_Months to the Starting_Date and then checks if the resulting date is valid. If the resulting date is not valid (e.g., 1-31-95 plus 1 month is 2-31-95), the highest valid date in that month (e.g., 2-28-95) is returned. Alpha Anywhere does recognize leap years.
